description: Situated in the centre of Athens and next to one of the biggest park of the city, Victory Inn offers great-value & comfortable accommodation. Just 500 metres from Victoria Metro Station for easy access to the historic district of Plaka and the Acropolis. Each of the rooms at Victory Inn is tastefully decorated and appointed with a host of modern amenities, including satellite TV, air conditioning and refrigerator for your comfort. The hotel staff are at your service 24-hours a day and happy to help you with all your requests. Victory Inn is just a short walk from the National Archaeological Museum and a host of bars and restaurants. From here, you can take the metro to the historical centre or even walk.
name: Victory Inn

description: Ideally located in the heart of Athens and within walking distance to many of the city’s main attractions, the Acropolis Select Hotel is the perfect place to stay during your next visit to Greece’s capital. A short stroll from the hotel places guests at the ancient site of the Acropolis, the New Acropolis Museum and the Plaka District, while other major landmarks such as Syntagma Square, the Temple of Olympian Zeus and the Flee Market as well as the city’s shopping hotspots are within easy reach. The property is a stone’s throw away from metro, tram and bus stations, making traveling around the city and its beach suburbs very convenient.This 72 room hotel has recently undergone renovation, fitted with elegant Italian design furniture, fine German fabrics and original pieces of art inspired from ancient Greece, which add to its modern, stylish decor and welcoming ambiance. The on-site rooftop restaurant, 180 West, serves snacks and Mediterranean cuisine and offers Acropolis views.
name: Acropolis Select Hotel

description:
Welcome to AD Athens Luxury Rooms and Suites, your Athens “home away from home.” AD Athens Luxury Rooms and Suites aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.
Close to some of Athens' most popular landmarks, such as Herod Atticus Odeon (0.2 mi) and Philopappos Hill (0.5 mi), AD Athens Luxury Rooms and Suites is a great destination for tourists.
Rooms at AD Athens Luxury Rooms and Suites offer air conditioning and a minibar providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.
A 24 hour front desk, a rooftop terrace, and baggage storage are some of the conveniences offered at this hotel. Free breakfast will also help to make your stay even more special.
While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the Mediterranean restaurants, including Nolan, Funky Gourmet, and Feedel Urban Gastronomy, all of which are a short distance from AD Athens Luxury Rooms and Suites.
If you’re looking for something to do, Acropolis (0.3 mi), Acropolis Museum (0.1 mi), and Plaka (0.5 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of AD Athens Luxury Rooms and Suites.
AD Athens Luxury Rooms and Suites puts the best of Athens at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.
name: AD Athens Luxury Rooms and Suites

description:

Strategically located at the city center, ibis Styles Athens Routes is a brand new 4 star hotel. Only 6' walk from the metro station and 15' walk to the Acropolis museum, the hotel offers the ideal setting to enjoy the city with ease.

A pet friendly 4 star hotel with comfortable rooms, colorful restaurant & bar, indoor parking & fitness room.

description: The Management and Staff invite you to enjoy hospitable surroundings and all the pleasures of Athens within easy reach! The Attalos Hotel, situated in the historic district of Athens, has a history of its own. Offering classic, comfortable accommodation, a friendly staff and atmosphere, Attalos Hotel has created a reputation as " Your home away from home in the heart of Athens". All of the hotel's 78 rooms are air-conditioned and fully equipped with central heating, Direct-dial telephone , Satellite TV , Mini refrigerator , Safe box , Private Bathrooms with hair dryers, slippers and bath amenities and of course Free wi-fi access internet. A charming roof garden/bar provides the perfect setting for enjoying a drink under the spectacular view of the Acropolis!

description: Grand Hyatt Athens is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Athens, offering a romantic environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay. Guest rooms offer amenities such as air conditioning and a refrigerator, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel. Grand Hyatt Athens features room service and a rooftop terrace, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property boasts a Rooftop pool and a lounge, the Atrium Open Air pool and its pool bar and the new Spa center of 1000m2. While staying at Grand Hyatt Athens, visitors can check out Philopappos Hill (0.7 mi) and Herod Atticus Odeon (1.0 mi), some of Athens' top attractions. While in Athens, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Grand Hyatt Athens, including Dionysos Zonar's (0.9 mi), Strofi (0.9 mi), and Mani Mani (0.8 mi). Athens is also known for some great architectural buildings, including Parthenon, The Academy of Athens, and First Cemetery of Athens, which are not too far from Grand Hyatt Athens. Enjoy your stay in Athens!

Today, Acropolis View, ‘newer’ than ever, fully renovated, continues to offer hospitality and services that aim to satisfy the guest. description: In the heart of Athens, Ivis4 Boutique Hotel & Restaurant offers the perfect combination of luxury, relaxation, and ease that your culture, business, family, or romantic trip needs. We’ve turned an old industrial building into a luxurious escape in close proximity to everything you must see in one of the most unique European capitals. With a choice of 14 spacious rooms designed by the firm awish architects, in modern style and the marvelous gastronomic experience that our all-day bar-restaurant has to offer, your stay can be nothing but amazing. Ivis4 is the home to unique art pieces by artist SimpleG, famous for his large scale murals around the globe, which can be enjoyed in multiple spaces of the hotel. Our mission is to create a unique experience for each one of our guests. From the moment you touch ground in Athens, we will take care of everything for you, leaving you the only responsibility of relaxing, having fun, and enjoying all that Athens has to offer. We’re hoping to host you on your next getaway.
name: Ivis4 Boutique Hotel

So, if you are seeking for a one-of-a-kind accommodation in Athens, Greece, plan the most delightful family vacations or holidays with friends in the heart of the city. Surrender to the modern comforts and refined pleasures offered at these upscale apartments in Athens and experience the authentic Greek hospitality in its finest form.

description: The Athens Gate Hotel is located in the historic district of Athens exactly opposite the Temple of Olympian Zeus. It is 400 m away from the Acropolis, 200 m away from the new Acropolis Museum, and on the doorstep of Plaka, the heart of the tourist district of Athens. It has recently been taken over by new Management, and fully renovated. Its style is modern and simple, as befits the area. New features include LCD TV in all rooms. In 2015 The Athens Gate Hotel was announced best case Hotel, under a research conducted by National and Kapodistrian University of Athens in order to identify energy consumption patterns and best efficiency in buildings in Attica Hotel sector.
name: The Athens Gate Hotel

description: Stately, with the air of an era long gone, the Electra Palace Athens, hospitable and aristocratic, awaits to welcome you in the heart of the city. Classical in its architecture and design, blending beautifully with the noble historical buildings of the Plaka area, the hotel’s elegant luxury is complemented by the majestic views of the Acropolis that can be enjoyed from the rooftop restaurant, pool, rooms and suites. Marble bathrooms; soft duvets; handmade carpets; custom furniture; these are but a few of the details that make the Electra Palace Athens luxuriously enjoyable. The amenities of our hotel will leave you wanting for nothing more: for your comfort and enjoyment, here you will find satellite T.V.s, laptop size electronic safes, Wi-Fi internet connection, and fully equipped bathrooms with hair dryer, bathrobes and slippers, magnifying mirror and more. Right in the city center and within walking distance from all major sights, easily accessible by car or public transport, the Electra Palace Athens is the ideal hotel for your stay in Athens whether you are here for business or leisure: spend a summer day at our outdoor swimming pool, soaking up the sun of Athens as it rises above the Acropolis – or spend it shopping in the city’s lively markets. Wander through the ancient Agora and visit the Parthenon – then wonder at its glory, all dramatically lit at night, from the balcony of your room. Stroll around the city under the autumn rain, then warm up in the hotel’s sauna. Relax after a day’s hard work - or blow off some steam - at the indoor pool or our gym. Enjoy our delicious contemporary greek cuisine at the award winning “Electra Palace Roof Garden” or at the “Motivo” in the lounge, or with a drink at the “Duck Tail”, our British inspired bar. For bigger celebrations or for business events in the heart of Athens, our hotel’s five-star service extends to our seven meeting rooms and ballrooms: fully equipped, air-conditioned and naturally lit, our halls can cater for up to 350 people for any event type, no matter how formal: host your business meeting here, or organize a successful conference. Or, have the reception or banquet of your dreams, tasteful and impeccable, a festive testament to your own sophisticated style.
name: Electra Palace Athens

description: We’ve managed to bring together comfort and modern design in the perfect location. Right in the center of Athens, just a few steps from Syntagma square, the never sleeping Ermou str. and the breathtaking Acropolis we have established the ideal urban destination. With 37 rooms in total, our goal is for you to enjoy a personalized experience, reminiscent of the vintage yet industrialized city of Athens. Greek marble and steel come together harmonically and bring out the Greek chic character of the rooms and the lobby area. Each room is unique and all elements are handpicked and custom made. Our philosophy is quite simple, we wish for our visitors to feel comfortable and at home in such a way that their stay in our hotel will be part of a unique experience of their trip in Athens.

description:
Novotel Athenes is the perfect hotel to live the authentic Greek experience in the heart of Athens. Relax and unwind in one of our 196 rooms. Food lovers will enjoy discovering international flavors at our restaurants. Savor 360° views of Athens and Acropolis from the roof terrace or re-energize in the gym and the outdoor pool during summer. For successful meetings, 8 flexible conference rooms will inspire you. Immerse yourself in Greek culture from our hotel near the city center, museums and monuments.
From Novotel Athenes easily discover the city gems. Live like a local, explore Athens, the street stalls in Monastiraki, travel through ages at the archaeological museum, feel Acropolis vibes. To end with, reward yourself at hotel's 360 breathtaking view. With 196 rooms, 8 meeting rooms, Pool, fitness center and food & beverage options, is the ideal setting for business and leisure stay. Close to metro stations, Novotel Athenes is providing easy access to Athens Airport, Piraeus Port and exploring Athens.
Your Time, Your Way !

description: The boutique 4 star hotel in the heart of Athens that redefines the meaning of the Athenian hospitality. “Niche” means comfort, rejuvenation and security in accommodation. An accommodation with background one of the biggest stations in Greek culture; Acropolis. Within 3 minutes by foot, the Acropolis Museum is a must-see cultural destination. Enjoy your luxurious stay in a room or suite, the design of which was made to harmonize the contemporary element with the Greek heritage. That’s why recycling materials were mainly used in the reconstruction of the building. Like, for example, the characteristic, idiotypic pattern with marble rhombs that adorns the bathrooms and the old, marble staircase of the building. These are made from Dionysos collectible marbles. Sleep on premium Coco-Mat mattresses made from natural raw materials. These high-quality bed systems will provide support to every part of your body after a day full of walking in Monastiraki and Plaka. When you wake up, Greek breakfast will surprise you with its unique tastes! Choose amongst 33 rooms & 4 suites and... have a niche stay!
name: Niche Hotel Athens

description:
Looking for a place to stay in Athens? Then look no further than ​St. George Lycabettus Lifestyle Hotel, a luxury hotel that brings the best of Athens to your doorstep.
Saint George Lycabettus Hotel offers guests an array of room amenities including a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available.
The hotel offers a concierge, a rooftop terrace, and room service, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features a rooftop pool and a rooftop bar.
For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Athens, ​St. George Lycabettus Lifestyle Hotel is located a short distance from Panathenaic Stadium (0.5 mi) and Monastiraki (0.9 mi).
If you’re looking for a Mediterranean restaurant, consider a visit to Nolan, Funky Gourmet, or Feedel Urban Gastronomy, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Saint George Lycabettus Hotel.
If you’re looking for something to do, Acropolis (1.0 mi), Acropolis Museum (1.0 mi), and Plaka (0.8 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of Saint George Lycabettus Hotel.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at ​St. George Lycabettus Lifestyle Hotel as you experience everything Athens has to offer.
name: ​St. George Lycabettus Lifestyle Hotel

description: Right by the iconic National Theatre of Athens, and only a few steps away from the renovated Omonia Square, you will find the as-smart-as-it-gets Kubic House. The 112 rooms put forward a discreet urban chic design and a smart, tech-focused attitude. Super packed with everything you might wish for, you are guaranteed a totally autonomous hotel experience. Our in-house gym is fully equipped to keep you fit while on holidays and our breakfast is an absolute delight. In Athens for business? Our meeting rooms are just perfect for presentations and workshops. Search no further, we have it all. Our rooms are designed to please. Bright and airy, they open up to a floor-to-ceiling window, gazing straight at the city. Naturally, you can control everything from your in-room Samsung tablet. Should you need to work, each room comes with an utterly comfy desk arrangement!
name: Brown Kubic, a Member of Brown Hotels

description: Welcome to Pan Hotel! So, what is the element that has made this 3 star city hotel of Athens operating for more than 50 years? The fact that is operated from the 3rd generation, something that effortlessly proves that tourism and hospitality run within the family, together with our friendly staff, are two of the most important aspects of our hotel that have made guests prefer us over and over again when visiting Athens. Our unique location (Syntagma Square), only adds to help you make the choice whether you are a family, a couple or a solo traveler, whether travelling for business or pleasure. The Parliament, National Garden, Panathinaic Stadium, Zappion, Plaka (old city of Athens), Monastiraki, Greek taverns, restaurants of national cuisines, Lycabetus Hill, churches of different religions, The Acropolis and Parthenon, numerous museums such as The Acropolis Museum, Archaeological Museum, The Benaki Museum, etc., central shopping areas, department stores, banks and embassies, etc. are all within walking distances from our hotel. Enjoy a walk or a swim at the beach by taking the Tram where its terminal is only 100m. from our hotel. Easily reached from the airport (El. Venizelos) or Piraeus port, as the Metro and the Airport Express Bus stop within 5 minutes walking distance from our hotel.
name: Pan Hotel

description: FAMILY HOSPITALITY AMID MONUMENTAL VIEWS Hotel HERODION, a superior first class hotel, the only with sweeping views of both the Acropolis and the acclaimed New Acropolis Museum, distanced only a few meters from its south entrance. Right in the heart of the upscale Acropolis residential neighborhood, part of the pedestrian walk unifying the most important archaeological sites, it is also near to the Plaka and Thissio districts as well as to the trendy areas of Gazi and Kerameikos. Framed by a museum-quality modern sculpture at the entrance, it is a superior, first class hotel with elegant contemporary look, classic in character and discreet in artistic touch, it is strategically located close to the metro station connecting to both the international airport and Piraeus port a gateway to the Greek Isles, two stops away from the city centre Guests of the HERODION Hotel enjoy a host of modern living amenities. The service is attentive and the 90 guest rooms are tastefully appointed, some with a spectacular view to the Acropolis. From rooftop lounges rich in sunbathing facilities, outdoor Jacuzzis and a unique outdoor bar and restaurant with breathtaking views, to the winter garden atrium and spacious dining areas – it’s easy to sit back and take it in all the surrounding beauty and history – well-equipped for executives and vacationers alike. POINT α , our roof top Bar-restaurant is a breathtaking experience. It is the closest you can get to viewing the Acropolis and the New Acropolis Museum. Serving Greek/ Mediterranean Contemporary cuisine with a summer brisk, drinks and cocktails prepared by our professional bartender, is open from May to Oct, 19:00 to 00:00/ [option of private dining]
name: Herodion Hotel

description:
Finding an ideal family-friendly hotel in Athens does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Hermes Hotel, a nice option for travelers like you.
Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Monastiraki (0.3 mi) and Herod Atticus Odeon (0.4 mi), guests of Hermes Hotel can easily experience some of Athens' most well known attractions.
Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.
Hermes Hotel features a 24 hour front desk, a rooftop terrace, and a concierge, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts free breakfast.
If you’re looking for a sushi restaurant, consider a visit to Nikkei, Sushimou, or Osaka Sushi Bar, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Hermes Hotel Athens.
During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like Acropolis (0.3 mi), Acropolis Museum (0.4 mi), and Plaka (0.2 mi), which are all within walking distance of the hotel.
Hermes Hotel looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Athens.

description:
NLH Kerameikos is a 35-room hotel, spread across 7 floors, that brings alive the storied history of Athens’ ancient potter’s settlement with an edgy urban aesthetic.
Encapsulating the ethos of this gentrified district, the hotel is surrounded by Athens’ most recognizable landmarks – from the majestic Acropolis to Pnyx where spirited orators like Pericles debated, the majestic dome of the National Observatory looming above the city and the fiery red obelisk-shaped chimneys of the old gas factory.
The decor reflects the rebellious street art that colours the city’s facades with muralist Billy Z’s stunning 15-metre-high artwork dominating the light shaft, lending its own narrative on contemporary Greek life.
name: NLH Kerameikos Hotel - Neighborhood Lifestyle Hotels

description: Colors Hotel Athens is the newest and most beautiful 4* Hotel in the heart of Athens! The coolest, sexiest, casual luxury rooms are now located in the most hip neighborhood of Athens. At 27-29 Benaki Street,in the heart of the city, 1 'from Akadimias Street, 5' from Panepistimio metro station, in the wonderful Neapoli Exarchion. Visit the most modern metropolis of Europe and enjoy your 4 * stay with the COLORS service that you know and love. 36 comfortable, casual luxury, sexy rooms in 7 categories, from Business Economy to The Penhtouse Suite to make your stay one of colorful adventures. Designed by PROJECT4 for all modern travelers: the business traveler who wants to be next to everything, the couple who wants to experience the pulse in the city center, the company that enjoys the nightlife of Athens and the family who wants to do all sightseeings. Explore Athens as a local, stay in the hippest part of the city, truly relax in our comfortable, amazingly-designed spaces and wake up refreshed to seize the day! Enjoy the unique casual luxury service of COLORS Hotels in hottest metropolis in Europe. The award-winning design, the central location, the personalized high quality services and the unique COLORS hospitality have made COLORS Hotels Greece the most beloved hotel brand in Greece, synonymous with style, coolness and unique hospitality. Come to our COLORS world! We have been expecting you! #stayincolors #colorsathens #colorshotels #notjustaroomforthenight

description: This very special hotel is housed in a classical building that recently has undergone a complete renovation (2007),just a few steps from the Acropolis and Plaka, adjacent to the new Acropolis museum, it is situated at the very heart of Athens historic center. The Acropolis Museum Hotel is at the foot of the Acropolis hill, just a few steps away from the Parthenon, the Temple of Zeus, Hadrian Arch and other monuments of Greek Civilization. Yet within a ten minute walk you can reach the Constitution Square (Syntagma), the Greek Parliament, Athens Stock market and Athens exclusive shopping areas of Ermou and Kolonaki.
name: Acropolis Museum Boutique Hotel

description: Centrally located in Athens city center,only a 5-minute walk from Acropolis Museum and the neighborhood of Plaka, Acropolis Stay offers modernly decorated rooms with free WiFi access. Guests can reach the city's famous landmarks, including the Parthenon and the Temple of Zeus, within walking distance. Every room is air-conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV, a coffee machine, a toaster and a kettle. Each one includes a modern bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer, while some also include a kitchenette. Daily cleaning service is provided. Guests can choose among 6 different breakfast menus, that will be delivered to their room in a breakfast box. Acropolis Metro Station is 200 metres from Acropolis Stay, while Syntagma Square lies within a 15-minute walk. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos Airport, 37 km from the property.
name: Acropolis Stay

description: Staying at The Gem Society Boutique Hotel & Spa will allow you to discover the true spirit of our ancient city; take in the magnificence of historical sites like the Acropolis, wander the narrow, winding cobblestone streets of alluring Plaka, pick up the best kebab in town from lively Monastiraki, stroll through the sensory treasures that are Psirri and Thisseo… A very convenient location, positioned in the hustle and bustle of downtown Athens, The Gem Society Boutique Hotel & Spa sits within walking distance to more than you will be able to handle! Located in the heart of Athens Historic Triangle, The Gem Society Boutique Hotel & Spa isn’t just a hotel, it’s a brand new hospitality experience. Set against a backdrop of ancient and contemporary, it is the ideal base for culture enthusiasts and history buffs as well as picky business travelers. Designed with the modern traveller in mind, efficient luxury and attention to absolute comfort embodies The Gem Society’s spirit of a memorable urban stay in the center of Athens. Blissful beds and luscious linens will guarantee our guests a heavenly night’s sleep, while amenities like a Nespresso coffee machine and well stocked mini-bar assure a feel-at-home experience. Simple luxury and a modern experience best describe The Gem Society Boutique Hotel & Spa spacious rooms. All our rooms have high quality bedding, sumptuous mattresses and plump pillows as well as custom made furniture, all designed with the determined city traveller in mind.
name: The Gem Society Boutique Hotel & Spa

description: City Circus is an alternative travelers space for the restless voyager, the escape artist, the acrobat. It's in the heart of Athens, in the hip Psirri neighborhood, beside numerous eateries and watering holes and a short walk from worthwhile sites. City Circus is in a 4-story, restored early 20th century mansion, complete with fresco-ed ceilings, wrought-iron balconies and baroque tiles. We’ve dressed it up with vintage furniture, reclaimed materials, modern design elements and street art by a selection of fresh local talent.
name: City Circus Athens

description: Inviting and welcoming, the Electra Athens, in the city's commercial district is the place to stay whether you are here for business or pleasure. Subtle and elegant and just off Syntagma square, our hotel rooms and suites are ideally located to host your city break or business trip without sacrificing the style and comfort you are used to. Designed with the busy traveler of the 21st century in mind, and operated, as all Electra Hotels and Resorts are, under the philosophy of warm, heartfelt Greek hospitality, the Electra Athens features cozy rooms, supreme amenities and delicious breakfast and meals. In our well-appointed hotel rooms and suites, the comfortable beds, muted décor and carefully chosen details create an atmosphere of soothing comfort, while in the breakfast restaurant and all day café, tasty dishes complete the delightful experience. If in town for business, you will find that the hotel's business facilities, natural lit conference hall, business services and staff make Electra ideal for your business stay - plus, since it is so centrally located, you will be able to have some non-business downtime as well, enjoying the sights and vibrant Athenian scene. Situated in the beginning of Ermou Street, the city's main shopping area, the Electra Athens hotel is conveniently located within walking distance from Plaka, Monastiraki and the Acropolis, as well as from the upscale district of Kolonaki with its wide choice of shopping and dining options. With the Athens metro just a few steps away, most of the city is within easy reach too, making the Electra Athens your perfect base for venturing about the city, doing business, discovering the Athenian treasures and enjoying your time in the capital of Greece. description: In the heart of Athens, just 800 metres from Acropolis and the New Acropolis Museum, Elia Ermou Athens Hotel offers accommodation in luxurious rooms and suites, most of them with hammam & jacuzzi. Conveniently located in Ermou street, the most commercial street of Athens, guests can enjoy the amazing view of Acropolis at the Athens View Balcon or a relaxing treatment at the Wellness Center. The scenic Plaka and the lively Monastiraki are just 400 metres away. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos Airport, 34 km from the property. Private parking is possible upon charge.

description: **Our hotel is taking SAFETY PRECAUTIONS AGAINST COVID-19** Arion Athens Hotel is a modern, city center hotel, a 2-minute walk from Monastiraki Metro Station, with direct access to the airport (ATH) and the port of Piraeus. The hotel’s extremely convenient location, in a quiet street, provides easy access to the Monastiraki Flea Market, Plaka, Thiseion, the Acropolis and the New Acropolis Museum as well as Syntagma Square, the Parliament, museums, shops and many more. Many restaurants, tavernas and bars can be found within small walking distance. Arion Athens Hotel features bright, stylish rooms and a rooftop garden with stunning Acropolis view. New Superior Rooms, offer Acropolis View right from your room. Free wireless Internet available and complimentary breakfast buffet.
name: Arion Athens Hotel

description: Welcome to Athens, where ancient history meets the vitality of one of the most exciting European cities. Indulge in the legacy of Greek hospitality which compliments the Meliá reputation and the Spanish heritage of passion for service. Whether you're here for work or just to stroll the city; this welcoming elegant hotel is situated in the heart of the intellectual part of the Greek capital. Let time slip away and explore ancient historic landmarks and discover the side street cafes and bookstores like a modern local philosopher. The rooms at Melia Athens include a flat-screen TV, air conditioning, minibar and free 3Mps Wifi available. Guests have free access to a fitness center, sauna, and Turkish bath, along with a rooftop pool and terrace (seasonal operation), and room service while staying at Melia Athens. With many well-known landmarks in the immediate vicinity, such as Monastiraki (1.1 km) and Temple of Hephaestus (1.2 km), Melia Athens guests have the opportunity to visit some of Athens' most popular attractions with ease. The hotel is a 5-minute walk from the Omonia Square metro stop. Athens is also known for its historic sites, including Acropolis, Parthenon, and Herod Atticus Odeon, which are not too far from Melia Athens. Melia Athens brings the best of Athens to you, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.
name: Melia Athens

description: Hotel Acropolis House is a preserved mansion of the last century, in excellent condition. It is consisted essentially of two different buildings together. The oldest of these is a stone manor house about 120 years old and the other is well-built four-floor building of 75 years. In 1965 it was modified to a hotel from the family Choudalakis, which operates since. Generally the hotel is a two star family business with character, providing security and full service to both families, and unique people who respect the identity of the hotel. In total the hotel has comfortable single, double and large rooms for families. The Hotel Acropolis House has a non smoking policy in all areas. Guests may smoke in the terrace of the first floor. Hotel Acropolis House is located at the gates of Plaka having so the advantage of being close to all the interesting places without the disadvantage of the hustle of the people and vehicles visiting the site. It is situated in a stunning location, either for professional or tourist as it is a 10-minute walk from the monument of Acropolis and the New Acropolis Museum, 3 minutes from Syntagma Square and the metro / bus and 2 minutes from the commercial and business center of Athens. Near the hotel there are parking, museums, pharmacies and the tourist information office. The hotel has a breakfast room, which served continental style breakfast very early in the morning for early morning flights (from 07.30 Until 10.30). There is luggage storage and safe for customers. Finally, Hotel Acropolis House has a library, with a rich collection, to borrow books from. This is himself occasionally enriched by the customers.
name: Hotel Acropolis House

description: With a great experience in offering wonderful vacations, this renovated hotel is welcoming you with 18 rooms decorated in a vey relaxing and classy style. Acropolis Ami Boutique Hotel is situated in a quiet and safe area of Athens centre and is very well connected with all the areas of the city by all public transportation (such as: metro, tram and bus), also with the airport and the port. Famous touristic attractions like: Parthenon, Acropolis Museum, the Temple of the Olympian Zeus, Zappeion, Panathinaikon Stadium and Hadrian's Arch, Monastiraki and Psirri are situated within a cozy walking distance from the hotel. All the rooms are equipped with air-conditioning, small fridge, Wi-Fi, flat-screen TV and some of the rooms are offering a stunning view of Acropolis. Acropolis Ami Boutique Hotel is offering a rooftop terrace where in the warm months you can enjoy in the morning a rich buffet breakfast and in the night you can spoil yourself with a drink or a cocktail, in a relaxing atmosphere with a breathtaking view of Acropolis. Our staff is always ready to assist you, offering to you information about the city and also helping you to plan your trip in Greece. Come to enjoy your vacation in an authentic Greek atmosphere!

description:
Finding an ideal budget friendly inn in Athens does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Hotel Ariston, a nice option for travelers like you.
Close to some of Athens' most popular landmarks, such as Temple of Hephaestus (1.0 mi) and Monastiraki (1.0 mi), Hotel Ariston is a great destination for tourists.
Rooms at Hotel Ariston provide a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.
In addition, while staying at Hotel Ariston guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and 24 hour check-in. You can also enjoy a lounge. Need a place to park? Parking is available at Hotel Ariston.
While in Athens be sure to experience local souvlaki favorites at Lithos, Liondi Traditional Greek Restaurant, or O Thanasis.
If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Plaka (1.1 mi) or National Archaeological Museum (0.7 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance.
Hotel Ariston looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Athens.

description: The philosophy at NLH Monastiraki reflects its neighborhood - quiet elegance, authentic and honest hospitality in a warm, friendly setting. In a stately building in the heart of Athens dating back to 1833, just 300 metres from Monastiraki Square, NLH Monastiraki marries old world charm and contemporary comfort. With 36 beautifully appointed rooms and suites and 15 different room types, the one thing you can be sure of, is that NLH Monastiraki promises a singularly different experience for each of its guests. The interiors retain the stone facade and wrought iron balconies that defined the architectural language of the 19th century. Done up in muted shades of apple green, teal and dusty pink, with designer light fixtures and smart use of space, the rooms have been modelled to optimize comfort. The calm and serenity indoors contrasts with the high-octane activity on the bustling Athinas and Pallados streets, exuding Athens’ unstoppable energy. The Standard Rooms at NLH Monastiraki offer great value-for-money stays; the Lofts offer a singularly different experience spread across two levels; while the spacious Suites are designed to accommodate the needs of our most demanding guests. Each room includes at least one bathroom with professional hairdryers, cotton slippers and luxury toiletries. Standard fixtures in all rooms include a work desk, a 43'' Smart TV with satellite channels, a laptop safe and a mini fridge. Free WiFi access is provided throughout. As you walk into the stylish reception area, you absorb the philosophy of easy elegance. Everything in this iconic building is a reminder of its rich history, but it comes through in a very accessible, organic way. Done up in rich black and white marble, the reception area on the ground floor, transports you to a gentler, more civilized era. Walk up to the first floor for a quiet coffee at the lobby bar or grab a snack from the “neighborfood” corner, through our vending machines that operate round-the-clock. Colorful artworks and neon lettering add to the lobby's youthful vibe. The same floor also hosts a meeting area, and a fitness area for gym enthusiasts. Enjoy a wholesome Breakfast Box that caters to all your dietary needs and taste preferences crafted by our reliable partners, delivered on request, to be enjoyed in the comfort of your room. Extra services include a 24-hour front desk. Restaurants, bars and shops can be found just a few steps away from NLH Monastiraki, some of whom have been around for well over a century, lending the neighborhood its unique color and character. The scenic Plaka area can be reached within a 10-minute walk. Athens International Airport is a direct metro ride away on the Blue Line and just a 40-minute drive away from the property. At NLH Monastiraki, you will experience Athens at its most charming: a nostalgic stay reminiscent of a bygone era, but also a vibrant city pulsating to the beat of the latest trends.
name: NLH Monastiraki Hotel- Neighborhood Lifestyle Hotels

description:
See why so many travelers make Athens Center Square their hotel of choice when visiting Athens. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a charming setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
Close to some of Athens' most popular landmarks, such as Monastiraki (0.3 mi) and Temple of Hephaestus (0.3 mi), Athens Center Square is a great destination for tourists.
The rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.
Athens Center Square Hotel features a concierge and a rooftop terrace. In addition, as a valued Athens Center Square Hotel guest, you can enjoy free breakfast that is available on-site.
During your visit, be sure to check out one of Athens' popular schnitzel restaurants such as Melilotos, Gostijo, and Bock Beer Restaurant, all a short distance from Athens Center Square Hotel.
During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like Acropolis (0.6 mi), Acropolis Museum (0.8 mi), and Plaka (0.3 mi), which are all within walking distance of the hotel.
At Athens Center Square, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Athens.

description: The AthensWas, a proud member of Design Hotels, is a luxury hotel in Athens situated in the beating heart of the city and just a breath away from the Acropolis Museum, the sacred Acropolis Hill and the old town of Athens, Plaka. Boasting an incredible location, right on Dionysiou Areopagitou pedestrian street, AthensWas offers 5 star design rooms and utterly luxurious suites and basks in magnificent views overlooking the most prized neighbourhood of Athens. This exquisite design hotel in Athens actually represents the Athens that was, is and will always be. Whether you are travelling for business or leisure, AthensWas is the ideal choice as it is in close proximity to Athens’ most important landmarks and, at the same time, in the heart of the modern city centre. Guests can saunter around the charming area by foot and absorb the Greek capital’s enchanting ambiance. The only downtown hotel with best view of Parthenon, AthensWas is a place to indulge all your senses. Here you will immediately immerse into the vibrant vibes of a city that carries centuries of culture and heritage. This modern design hotel in Athens promises an indelible stay experience with immaculate Acropolis views, superior services and a thorough list of facilities, thus ensuring its guests’ absolute satisfaction. Ideally situated on the most prestigious pedestrian walkway of historic Athens, Dionysiou Areopagitou street, your day here will start with amazing pictures: right next to Acropolis on one side and within the bustling city centre on the other, the options are endless to ensure the most comfortable holidays in Athens. So if you are in search of the best 5 star luxury hotel near Acropolis, seek no further: AthensWas is your perfect match. Experience a piece of Athenian history and indulge in the unique sensation of timeless elegance and modern sleekness. AthensWas hotel is a tribute to Athenian cultural authenticity and a pillar of modern day Athenian hospitality. Paying homage to the luxurious, classical Athenian era and imbued with the minimalist simplicity that the current age demands, clean, uncluttered lines dominate the interiors of AthensWas, one of the top design hotels in Athens. AthensWas embraces its guests in the best of Athenian aesthetics, understated luxury and incomparable levels of comfort. The lustrous finesse of Greek marble, sourced from different locations around Greece, the perennial grandeur of Greek walnut wood and the minimal sophistication of the Italian, designer furnishings and fabrics come together to exude a sense of contemporary refinement and demure opulence, justifying its title as a luxury design hotel in Athens. Those who look for out-of-the-ordinary hotels with luxury suites in Athens will be surprised by AthensWas’ unparalleled design, inimitable character and unsurpassed offerings. This five star hotel in the centre of Athens is as unique as the glorious history and culture of this diversified city. Furthermore, SENSE Restaurant is perched at AthensWas hotel’s most prized spot: its spectacular rooftop. Graced with impressive views of the striking Acropolis, SENSE is undeniably among the best rooftop restaurants in Athens combining incredible panoramic views of the city with delectable dishes. Our Chef, Alexandros Charalambopoulos and his team have devised an utmostly creative menu that focuses around original, inspired Greek combinations with a modern approach and a twist of refinement. Profound love for Greek gastronomy, commitment to the best ingredients and a dedication that comes with experience are the foundations upon which the menu of SENSE Restaurant is built. SENSE Restaurant occupies a prime location in Athens city that is available to be enjoyed throughout the day with a selection of signature cocktails and an exemplar list of wine appellations. SENSE Restaurant is also the place where business meets pleasure. Business lunches take on a different turn at our rooftop restaurant, as the incredible surroundings lend themselves to create a most enjoyable and pleasant aura. We can prepare a bespoke set menu and make sure all your needs are met ensuring the success of your corporate event. Not to be missed to mention that AthensWas offers the ideal option for indulging in a mouthwatering breakfast, full of flavour and goodness. Devised by our Chef, even the breakfast carries his personal signature and passion for vibrant Greek flavours made from the freshest ingredients. A scrumptious selection of dishes made with Greek raw materials, 95% organic, based on classic recipes with a modern twist and a bit of an edge to steer clear of being ordinary. Also, PROMENADE is the new outlet of AthensWas Hotel and it consists in a cool and unpretentious ambience offering delectable comfort food and a fine selection of mostly Greek wines and refreshing cocktails. Located on the hotel’s ground floor, PROMENADE is wrapped in the intimacy of the hotel’s exquisite yet serene atmosphere, giving guests a cozy feeling of warmth and a huge welcome to authentic Athens. At last but not least, a fully equipped fitness corner with cutting-edge technology equipment is available, as well as an ultra-modern business centre with design furniture and all necessary equipment for a flawless corporate event. * Kindly note, that the hotel cannot provide accommodation to people with walking disabilities.
name: AthensWas Design Hotel

description: The Athens Cypria Hotel is a friendly, quiet and cozy 4 Star property. Ideally situated in the heart of Athens approximately 150 meters from Syntagma Square offers a fine base for exploring all the city's attractions. One of the most well-known shopping places in the city, Ermou Street, is adjacent to the hotel, whereas the old town of Plaka and Acropolis are just a few minutes walk away. Psiry area, the most well-known place in Athens for night entertainment, is also within easy walking distance, where Greek Restaurants and Taverns, Bars and Theatres are found. The hotel consists of 114 rooms which have been specially designed to ensure guest personal comfort and relaxation. Most of them have balconies and some with a view to Acropolis. The rooms are equipped with air-condition / heating, fully stocked mini-bar (consumption charged), high speed internet access (free of charge), satellite TV, Russian (Channel 1) and Chinese (CCTV) satellite channels available. electronically locked safe-box (free of charge), direct dial telephone, radio and hairdryer, all included in room prices. The American buffet breakfast, included in room rates, is served in the breakfast room at 7 a.m. till 10.30 a.m with freshly prepared hot and cold breakfast selections. The Annabel Café Bar, in a welcoming and congenial atmosphere offers tempting cocktails and a wide selection of wines, cold or hot beverages, snacks, salads, ice-creams but also local and international sweets / desserts, thus being an ideal place for lunch.
name: Athens Cypria Hotel

description: Located on Filellinon Street, next to Constitution Square (Syntagma Square), this contemporary design hotel, is perfectly positioned for the sights of Athens, including the ruins of Plaka, the Acropolis and its museum, the stylish boutique shopping district of Kolonaki, and the bustling business zone. Situated in the former Olympic Palace Hotel, New Hotel encompasses the heritage of its past by using recycled parts of the old hotel and reinterpreted local materials to create a complete work of art, where outstanding interiors, unusual custom-made furniture and handmade fixtures make guests feel that they live and breathe in a major art installation. Offering an entirely NEW approach this 79-room and suites establishment, is one of the city’s finest examples of modernist architecture and the first ever hotel project of award designer duo, Fernando and Humberto Campana.
name: NEW Hotel

description: Wyndham Grand Athens hotel welcomes you, fully renovated, to a new haven of affordable luxury in the center of Athens. Conveniently located right next to Metaxourgeio metro station Wyndham Grand Athens hotel is the ideal starting point to explore every major attraction and significant landmarks within minutes. With 276 rooms and suites in 8 floors, Wyndham Grand Athens hotel offers a wide variety of brand new accommodations to suit single, couple or family needs for business or leisure travelers. In addition to its great locale, Wyndham Grand Athens hotel boasts exceptional Mediterranean and International cuisine dining options to delight your senses. Wyndham Grand Athens is the only one of Athens hotels that offers 360 degree panoramic views of the Acropolis, Lycabettus hill and the Saronic Gulf from its impressive rooftop bar restaurant. Enjoy the breathtaking view with a refreshing cocktail or a delightful meal by our magnificent outdoor waterfall swimming pool. The hotel's spacious interior features 2.500 sq. meters of multi-functional conference and event spaces with a capacity of up to 2000 pax. Combined with state of the art equipment and a well-trained staff, your meetings, gala events or weddings are guaranteed to be a complete success. Free super fast Wi-Fi internet connection in all public areas and rooms accommodate even the most demanding online needs. If you're seeking rest and relaxation, and even a bit of pampering, our lovely spa center is at your service for facial treatments, full-body massages and much more. Stay fit & healthy in a fully equipped gym and feel rejuvenated with a sauna experience during your stay. We invite you to live the Wyndham Grand experience, indulge in our high quality service to the highest standards of Wyndham Grand Worldwide and become our best "ambassador".
name: Wyndham Grand Athens

description: Welcome to The Dolli! Gazing at the Parthenon, few steps away from the Acropolis & in front of the historical Plaka neighbourhood. An one-of-a-kind view of the ancient world. A historical 1925 mansion, designed by Andreas Kriezis, one of the brilliant greek classical architects is reimagined today as a contemporary Hôtel Du Luxe. Encapsulating a strong sense of heritage, the original essence of greek hospitality and the incomparable vibrant energy in the heart of Athens. 46 luxurious bedrooms, pied à terres & apartments privés bathed in athenian light. The roofτop is a unique pièce de résistance with stunning views, a members only pool and the exclusive haven, Dolli's Restaurant.
name: The Dolli

description: Athens Backpackers 2.0 will change how you travel again in 2021 and into the future just like we did in 2003 when we first opened. We will be completely renovated from May 2021 onwards by the award wining dynamic Greek design duo 'Under The Spell' Our famous Sunnies Roof Bar is now split over 2 Roof Top levels with Insane views of the Acropolis, Mountains and Ocean. Our drinks, food & cocktails are hand crafted by Greek Maestro B Diddy and can be ordered till late. Our new lobby bar is open 24hrs a day showcasing playlists and music from renowned Greek DJ & Musicologist Elephant Phinix and also has a large space to chill eat or drink with spaces to socialise or just be on your own. With a wide selection or local craft beers and snacks to keep you fuelled and happy. Our new patented capsule beds have USB ports, power points and private mood lights so you can escape everything to your own private space when ever you need to. The building is fitted with smart technology throughout with coil heating/cooling, smart lights and keyless entry and high speed checkin available. There is also free high speed Wifi throughout, 24 hour free luggage storage, free locally sourced breakfast, daily "discover the sites" walking tours and a focus on seeing the real Athens whilst meeting other like minded people. ***Our Location *** Is truly unbeatable only 3 mins walk from the Acropolis, 2 min walk to Hadrians Arch, 5 min walk to Temple of Zeus and 1 min to the Plaka and Ancient Cobblestone pathway that circles the city, in the coolest safest part of the city. We are only a 2 min walk from the Acropolis Metro Station with direct access to the beach if you need a dip. *** Rooms and Dorms*** Make the choice between patented private capsule beds, studios or apartments all sleeping options have access to all our facilities. The private room are located in the Studios building. ***Extra and Activities*** We have a large array of events, activities in our bars, social spaces and across our properties. Everything is available to all our guests many our free some have small charges where applicable. Please note due to the Covid 19 situation we are not allowed by law to serve free breakfast till further notice.
name: Athens Backpackers

description:
Finding an ideal romantic hotel in Athens does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Athens Mansion Luxury Suites, a nice option for travelers like you.
Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Monastiraki (0.3 mi) and Temple of Hephaestus (0.4 mi), guests of Athens Mansion Luxury Suites can easily experience some of Athens' most well known attractions.
You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer air conditioning, a minibar, and a refrigerator, and you can stay connected during your stay as Athens Mansion Luxury Suites offers guests free wifi.
Plus, Athens Mansion Luxury Suites offers free breakfast, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day.
Athens has plenty of steakhouses. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like To Paradosiako, Meatropoleos 3, and Basegrill Athens, which are serving up some great dishes.
If you are interested in exploring Athens, check out a garden, such as National Garden.
Athens Mansion Luxury Suites looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Athens.
name: Athens Mansion Luxury Suites

description:
Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Athens, Katerina Hotel is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its family-friendly environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Katerina Hotel makes it easy to enjoy the best of Athens.
You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and you can stay connected during your stay as Katerina Hotel offers guests free wifi.
The hotel features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and baggage storage. Plus, Katerina Hotel offers free breakfast, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. For guests with a vehicle, street parking is available.
While staying at Katerina Hotel, visitors can check out Monastiraki (0.7 mi) and Temple of Hephaestus (0.7 mi), some of Athens' top attractions.
Athens has plenty of cafes. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like 360 Degrees, Noel, and Six D.o.g.s, which are serving up some great dishes.
Best of all, Katerina Hotel makes it easy to experience some great Athens attractions like Frissiras Museum, which is a popular .
Whether you’re traveling for business, pleasure or both, Katerina Hotel is sure to make your visit to Athens one worth remembering.
name: Hotel Katerina

description:
Looking for a place to stay in Athens? Then look no further than Adrian Hotel, a charming hotel that brings the best of Athens to your doorstep.
Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.
Adrian Hotel features a 24 hour front desk, a rooftop terrace, and a concierge, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts free breakfast. If you are driving to Adrian Hotel, there is paid private parking available nearby.
Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Monastiraki (0.2 mi) and Temple of Hephaestus (0.2 mi), guests of Adrian Hotel Athens can easily experience some of Athens' most well known attractions.
While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the Mediterranean restaurants, including Nolan, Funky Gourmet, and Feedel Urban Gastronomy, all of which are a short distance from Adrian Hotel.
Looking to explore? Then look no further than Acropolis (0.2 mi), Acropolis Museum (0.4 mi), and Plaka (0.1 mi), which are some popular Athens attractions – all conveniently located within walking distance of the hotel.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Adrian Hotel as you experience everything Athens has to offer.
name: Adrian Hotel

description:
Polis Grand Hotel is a place with a special presence in the historic center of Athens, where you can experience an unparalleled sense of intimacy. Starting from the smiling faces of our people, the tasty breakfast in the bright dining area including Greek products and handmade delicacies, the flavors, and the smell of Greek coffee in the outdoor spaces of Polis Life coffee shop, and arriving at the colorful shades of the Attic sky to admire the imposing Acropolis view from the Polis Blue Sky Rooftop of the hotel on the 10th floor, your stay here will be unforgettable.

The hotel is centrally located next to the metro station (with direct access to the airport and the Piraeus port) and the National Archaeological Museum. Within a short walking distance, you will find Acropolis, some of the most popular cultural destinations of Athens and the best places for food and entertainment. Polis Grand Hotel is the ideal place to start exploring the most interesting and sought-after places of Athens and experience the city like a local.
Renovated in 2022, Polis Grand Hotel consists of elegant and cozy spaces framed by contemporary artworks, which stand out for their modern aesthetics and the warm atmosphere they create.

The hotel offers 100 bright and airy rooms and suites. Most of them boast balconies with city or Acropolis views. Stylishly decorated with carefully selected fabrics, wooden floors, and linings, they are also totally functional with open closets, office desks, USB hubs and high-speed Wi-Fi, creating a modern and welcoming environment for our guests.
Excellent food and drink options are waiting for you in the Polis Grand premises. Visit our main restaurant, Polis Sunlight, to taste the famous Greek breakfast, savor the homemade desserts at Polis Life and head to the amazing Polis Blue Sky Roof Top for refreshing cocktails and Mediterranean flavors that will elevate your evening here.
name: Polis Grand Hotel

description:
Finding an ideal romantic small hotel in Athens does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Home and Poetry, a nice option for travelers like you.
For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Athens, Home and Poetry is located a short distance from Herod Atticus Odeon (0.2 mi) and Monastiraki (0.5 mi).
Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Home and Poetry offer air conditioning and a refrigerator.
During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a 24 hour front desk, a rooftop terrace, and baggage storage. Guests of Home and Poetry are also welcome to enjoy free breakfast, located on site.
While in Athens, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Home and Poetry, including Nolan (0.3 mi), Funky Gourmet (1.2 mi), and Feedel Urban Gastronomy (0.4 mi).
Should time allow, Acropolis, Acropolis Museum, and Plaka are some popular attractions that are within walking distance.
Home and Poetry looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Athens.

description:
Finding an ideal family-friendly hotel in Athens does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Jason Inn, a nice option for travelers like you.
Guest rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and Jason Inn makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.
You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and a rooftop terrace. In addition, guests can enjoy free breakfast during their visit. As an added convenience, there is parking available to guests.
Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Temple of Hephaestus (0.3 mi) and Monastiraki (0.3 mi), guests of Jason Inn can easily experience some of Athens' most well known attractions.
During your visit, be sure to check out one of Athens' popular oyster restaurants such as Cinque Wine & Deli Bar, BlueFish Athens, and Estiatorio Milos, all a short distance from Jason Inn.
During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like Acropolis (0.6 mi), Acropolis Museum (0.8 mi), and Plaka (0.5 mi), which are all within walking distance of the hotel.
Jason Inn puts the best of Athens at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.
name: Jason Inn

description: Situated at the foot of the Acropolis in the historical heart of Athens, Ergon House is a seventh heaven for food enthusiasts, complete with ‘rooms above the inn’. We have conceived a spectacular marketplace, a modern-day Agora with a constellation of greengrocers, a butcher’s, fishmonger’s and bakery, a delicatessen and roastery, along with a bar and restaurant which celebrate the best of Greek cuisine culture. And we have expanded on the unique experience of an epicurean boutique hotel by creating cool common ground in which to cook and lounge, a gym for good conscience, as well as a roof terrace planted with olive trees that has unbeatable views of the city.
name: Ergon House

description: "A modern-day edition of comfort" Created with a deep respect for its heritage, The Editor Athens Hotel is echoing the soul of a place, where heyday stories were born, written and printed. Step through our doors and discover a city hideaway, where every detail weaves together past and present. Step through our doors and discover 40 tailor-made rooms serving as the perfect city hideaway, where every detail weaves together past and present. From a product-focussed cuisine and a nestled-in green patio, accommodating the needs of a small group conference or event, to individually-designed rooms; this is Athens living to the fullest. Guests are invited to freshly start the day with a sumptuous breakfast served on the roof top restaurant, before embarking on the city's most stylish rendez-vous. The central location of the Hotel, just few steps from Agias Eirinis Square, a multi-culti hot spot thriving all day with coffee shops, eateries and bars, is ideal to get acquainted with the true Athenian spirit right away. Alternatively, for those who prefer to stay inside, the Hotel offers a handful of personalised services, as well as iconic facilities for well-deserved dining and wining experience
name: The Editor Athens Hotel

description: The hotel is newly renovated and located in one of the safest areas of Athens, near the Music Hall and the USA Embassy, with lots of coffee shops and restaurants in the area. The Parthenon and the Athens central shopping center as well as the main square of Athens (Constitution Square) are a 20 minutes walking distance away. You can also use the public bus (5 minutes walking distance at Mavilli Square) or the Metro (2 minutes walking distance to Megaro Mousikis stop).

description:
Welcome to Athens la Strada, your Athens “home away from home.” Athens la Strada aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.
While staying at Athens la Strada, visitors can check out Monastiraki (0.3 mi) and Temple of Hephaestus (0.4 mi), some of Athens' top attractions.
Athens la Strada offers guests an array of room amenities including a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available.
The small hotel offers a 24 hour front desk, room service, and baggage storage, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features free breakfast.
While in Athens, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Athens la Strada, including Nolan (0.1 mi), Funky Gourmet (1.0 mi), and Feedel Urban Gastronomy (0.1 mi).
Should time allow, Acropolis, Acropolis Museum, and Plaka are some popular attractions that are within walking distance.
Athens la Strada puts the best of Athens at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

description: Located in the heart of Athens just few steps away from Acropolis Museum and the National Museum of Contemporary Art, NLH FIX offers modern and spacious Suites with free WiFi, fully equipped kitchenette featuring a cozy seating area. Every Suite comes with Cocomat mattresses, Samsung Smart TV 40’’ with satellite channels, usb sockets, Nespresso machine, dining table, laptop safe and working desk. NLH FIX | Neighborhood Lifestyle Hotels lives in a seven-storey building, becoming a residential hub for travelers of the world, who want a hotel with personality – a place to live. Our spacious and aery suites are individually furnished with integrity, taste and superb functionality, creating a comfortable, social and stylish hotel experience. Decorated in a soothing, “no color” color palette, with a mix of custom and iconic hand-picked pieces of furniture, the interiors evoke a sense of ease and comfort and the character of visiting a friend who just happens to have amazing style.

description:
See why so many travelers make Coco-Mat Hotel Athens their hotel of choice when visiting Athens. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a romantic setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
Close to some of Athens' most popular landmarks, such as Panathenaic Stadium (0.4 mi) and Monastiraki (1.0 mi), Coco-Mat Hotel Athens is a great destination for tourists.
Rooms at Coco-Mat Hotel Athens provide a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.
In addition, while staying at Coco-Mat Hotel Athens guests have access to a concierge, room service, and a rooftop terrace. You can also enjoy free breakfast.
While visiting Athens, you may want to try some schnitzel at one of the nearby restaurants, such as Melilotos, Gostijo, or Bock Beer Restaurant.
Looking to explore? Then look no further than Acropolis (1.0 mi), Acropolis Museum (1.1 mi), and Plaka (0.9 mi), which are some popular Athens attractions – all conveniently located within walking distance of the hotel.
At Coco-Mat Hotel Athens, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Athens.
name: Coco-Mat Hotel Athens

description: In the heart of Plaka, on the pedestrian street of Adrianou, we have created a space of modern Urban aesthetics dominated by the glass, the wood, and the concrete, in harmony with the "aroma" of ancient Athens. The "101 Adrianou Luxury Urban Stay" is a complex of eight unique ApartSuites of 50 to 60 m². which are divided into two categories based on their view (Acropolis View & Garden View) and into four categories based on their design. (Yellow / Red / Grey / White) In the heart of an area with many award-winning restaurants, cafeterias, bars, and squares within reach, and with a number of archaeological monuments and museums in a radius less than 1000m. The nearest metro station (Acropolis Station) is just 450 meters away, while the Syntagma Square with the parliament building and the most central shopping pedestrian street of the country (Ermou street) are just 500 meters away.
name: 101 Adrianou Apartments

description: Favorably located in the heart of the city, close to Athens’s most vibrant neighbourhoods, housed in a fully renovated building dating back to 1938, typical of the mid-war period architecture of Athens, we’ve had the amazing opportunity to use all of our enthusiasm and creativity in order to create The Marblous (deriving from Marble + Marvelous) offering elegant, hip and contemporary accommodation and providing genuine hospitality while engaging thoughtful service and giving attention to detail with the aim of creating marvelous experiences. An important characteristic and element of The Marblous is the key role of the windows, both in the rooms and in the breakfast bistrot at the ground floor; they act as small, colorful “pictures of Athens” hanging on the walls and allowing the visitor to feel the city vibes in the most living and direct way possible. Women discretely played an important role while creating the core of this concept (whether they are travelling alone, with their friends, their partner or their family) and their needs are taken into consideration on all levels of its operation. From the first glance, this philosophy manifests itself primarily in its particular aesthetic identity, which combines the timeless texture of blushing marble tiles with a pastel color palette and select elements of curvature and softness, making one immediately feels an elegant sense of calm while creating a minimalist style that elicits a sense of well-being. Moving on, it is also apparent in its comfortable and tasteful rooms and suites (some of which have a view of the city and the Acropolis), which include “marvellous” pampering details that make all the difference, like full-length mirrors, work desks / dressing tables and luxury brand beauty and personal care products for our guests. A different accommodation experience that emits femininity and makes everyone feel like a true guest in an oasis of serenity and good taste, invigorating their senses and providing the energy needed to explore the lively city literally lying at their feet.
name: The Marblous Athens

description: Situated in the heart of Athens close to the Acropolis, Evripides Hotel Athens is the place to be when you want to go sightseeing! It is conveniently located within a short walking distance of all the main archaeological sites, Plaka, athens most picturesque district and within easy reach of many attractions such as museums and galleries. There is also a metro station nearby providing easy access for those coming from the international airport or from Piraeus port and for those who want to explore the entire city. Evripides hotel offers comfort and high quality services by our friendly and helpful staff. Rooms are functional and relaxing, warmly decorated with traditional touches creating the ideal environment for a pleasant stay in Athens. ... And don't miss our roof garden on the 7th floor overlooking the Acropolis and providing a panoramic view of Athens, where your breakfast is served and where you can enjoy a drink in the evening!

description: "Neoma" Pronunciation: nee·ow·muh Origin: Greek - female name Meaning: new moon; pleasantness; Enchanted by the secrets of the sky, we envisioned a place that would serve as a sanctuary amidst a vibrant landscape. Enviably located in the heart of Athens, Neoma offers modern hospitality in one of the country’s most historic cities. Opting for urban luxury in all simplicity, this boutique hotel invites you to rest after a busy day enjoying the city. Discover bright and elegant rooms where the details have been tended to so that your stay is comfortable and intimate. Check into unique spaces with minimal design and eclectic city views, then set out to discover the city and its easygoing vibe. Connect with natural beauty in your very own enclave of remarkable seclusion and get lost into the sky’s blue. Breathe in the captivating views at the Rooftop terrace where the stage is set for you to enjoy a uniquely sumptuous pool experience. Stay steps from delicious dining, boutique shopping, and a lively nightlife at our hotel. Impeccable service and welcoming staff are what set Neoma apart. Our guests are pampered with a wide variety of personalized services and luxe amenities for a stay that relaxes and recharges from check-in to departure.
name: Neoma

description: Athens Green Apartments Luxury Apartment rentals in the heart of Athens with hotel amenities, in a quiet green surrounding in the exclusive neighbourhood of Mets. Athens Green Apartments are minutes walk from Greek Parliament and the Acropolis, 400 m from the National Botanical Gardens and attached to the pine forest of the Panathenaic (all-marble) stadium.Panathenaic Stadium is the place which the first Olympic Games of the modern world were held in 1896. Athens Green Apartments were designed and operated for a reason: They provide people who visit Athens for a short or long period a home with privacy, quite surroundings and big spacesTheir Courtyard is for meetings or parties and to invite their friends to house not a hotel roomThe philosophy and concept of Athens Green Apartments is that visitors in Athens who stay for long or short term can enjoy the modern design, privacy and green surroundings, in the historical city centre minutes walk of the major Athens Attractions. They are design for that they are no just local people apartments which are rented in a season or in absence of the owner. (Find your new true home away from home during your stay in Athens, either for 2 days or 10 months with peace of mind regarding linen cleaning, housekeeping and/or utilities such as internet, gas, water, etc.

description: Twelve apartments in the center of Athens, designed for the traveler that wants to explore the city and live like the locals. “Handmade”, fully equipped, value-for-money, contemporary touch, classic attire, next to everything you will ever need. Centrally located Live in Athens offers modernly decorated, self-catering accommodation with free WiFi. Within walking distance, you will find many shops, bars and restaurants, while Monastiraki Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away. Accommodation at Live in Athens features minimal interiors in light colours. Each unit comes with a kitchen or kitchenette, dining table, fridge, toaster and microwave. Facilities also include a flat-screen TV, air conditioning, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The New Acropolis Museum is 1.5 Km away, while at 400 metres you can also visit the Ancient Agora of Athens. The central Syntagma Square is 1 km away and Ermou shopping street is a 5-minute walk away.
name: Live in Athens, Short Stay Apartments

description: Periscope is the YES! Hotels antidote to the ordinary city hotel. Modern minimalism and award-winning architectural design create a Young, Energetic and Seductive urban haven, right at the heart of Kolonaki, the oldest and most exclusive neighborhood in Athens. The original mundane building, dating from the 1950s, is now a tribute to clean lines and uncluttered spaces, balancing ergonomic solutions with urban aesthetics. Form, color, and texture create a feeling of order and tranquility. A modern ‘home’ for the long weekend or for the short break, Periscope is a firm favorite among business and leisure travelers. Situated in the coveted Haritos Street, number 22, Periscope is just a 10 minutes’ walk from Syntagma square and a 5 minutes’ walk from Evangelismos Metro station. It is also a 30 minutes’ car drive both from Athens International Airport and the port of Piraeus.

description:
Short version, for Airbnb 500 ch.
Bob W is the smart alternative to hotels and random rentals. Get everything you need to live, work and play: keyless access, fast WiFi, smart TVs, local gym access, 24/7 support, regular professional cleaning and more. Stay in the heart of Athens, just off the Acropolis. Inside you’ll find mid-century-inspired interiors, local furniture and art. Every night is climate-neutral and fully carbon offset. 

Long version, for Booking.com 1200 ch.
Bob W is the smartest alternative to hotels and random rentals. Every night is climate-neutral and fully carbon offset. Get everything needed to live, work and play for as long as you want: keyless access, fast WiFi, local gym access, 24/7 support, and regular professional cleaning – you name it. It is also possible to request early check-in and late check-out.

When you stay with Bob, you’re getting an authentic taste of the local neighbourhood. This iconic Athens building near Plaka was built in 1946.
Bob is the mythical globetrotter who calls nowhere home but is at ease anywhere. After travelling around the world from Chicago to Kathmandu and everywhere in between, Bob has developed refined taste when it comes to accommodation. His holy grail are places that blend the consistent quality of a hotel with the authentic flair and affordability of a host’s home. The problem is that these types of places are almost impossible to find. That’s why he decided to create his own category of exceptionally cool short-stay accommodation that combines the best of both worlds. 

When you sleep with Bob, you always know what to expect: an awesome location in a handpicked neighbourhood, interiors created by local designers, and a commitment to sustainability.  Welcome to Bob’s world!
Staying at Bob W Eolou is an immersive experience in the heart of Athens' bustling energy and rich culture. As you wander down Eolou (Aeolou) Street, you're enveloped in the essence of the city, where the air is filled with the tantalising aroma of freshly brewed Greek coffee and mouthwatering souvlaki sizzling on open grills. 

Besides an array of cafes, restaurants, and shops selling Greek produce, Bob W Eolou is situated a mere 5-minute walk from the Monastiraki metro station, granting swift access to the rest of the city's wonders. The Ancient Agora of Athens is a short 9-minute stroll from the building, while the majestic Acropolis is 1.3 km away, making this location a perfect starting point for exploring the city's most iconic landmarks.
name: Bob W Eolou Athens

description: A superior 4-star hotel in Athens with a magnificent view of Lycabettus Hill and emphasis on first-rate hospitality. The Athens Zafolia Hotel is a modern hotel in downtown Athens, with a contemporary building designed with bold lines of glass and granite outside and the discreet luxury of marble, wood and leather inside. The Hotel provides guests with high-standard services and accommodation, offering unique opportunities for relaxation, with a Lobby Bar, Restaurant and one of the most beautiful Roof Garden Restaurants in Athens with a spectacular view. Our Hotel offers 191 guestrooms, flexibly configured to meet the diverse needs of every guest, from Executive Rooms and Suites for the busy, yet demanding business executive to Classic or Family Rooms for the everyday traveller & families. Finally, The Athens Zafolia Hotel is also a Conference Hotel and it is the perfect choice for business or social gatherings, exhibitions, presentations, as well as receptions, events and happenings.
name: Athens Zafolia Hotel

description: Delice Hotel & Family Apartments is strategically situated on Vassileos Alexandrou street in a friendly and upcoming neighborhood. It’s only one stop away from Syntagma square and both bus stop and Evangelismos metro station are only 5 minutes walking distance. The hotel was built in 1970’s as a furnished apartment hotel and has been renovated in 2004. During 2016 the hotel was partially renovated again in order to provide all modern conveniences and high quality hospitality services to its guests. The renovation is estimated to be completed by March 2017. Our apartments are suitable for large families, businessmen who desire comfortable rooms for work and meetings But also for the visitor of Athens who wishes to study, go shopping or just tour. The experienced staff of the hotel, offers effective services and is always willing to assist you in whatever you may need during your stay at Delice Hotel & Family Apartments.

description:
Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. 
For travelers visiting Athens, Mc Queen Rooms & Apartments is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. 
Well-known for its charming environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Mc Queen makes it easy to enjoy the best of Athens.

Mc Queen offers different kind of apartments from small studios up to Suites with three Bedrooms. 

You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered , including a front desk that is open daily from 07:30 - 23:30 , room service, bar with a garden ,baggage storage, parking, transfer from the airport/port and Sightseeing tours. 

In addition, guests can also enjoy a breakfast during their visit. 
While staying at Mc Queen , visitors can check out Temple of Hephaestus (0.9 mi) and Open Air Cinema THISION (0.9 mi), some of Athens' top attractions.

If you like Traditional Restaurants and wine bars, Mc Queen is conveniently located near Kanella, Thessalos , Rafiki, The Egg of the Rooster and a walking distance from Kerameikos metro (blue line).

Mc Queen Rooms & Apartments is sure to make your visit to Athens one worth remembering.
name: Mc Queen Rooms & Apartments
