description:
Finding an ideal trendy hotel in Athens does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Novus City Hotel, a nice option for travelers like you.
Rooms at Novus City Hotel offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.
A 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service are some of the conveniences offered at this hotel. A pool and free breakfast will also help to make your stay even more special. If you are driving to Novus City Hotel, free parking is available.
For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Athens, Novus City Hotel is located a short distance from Monastiraki (0.7 mi) and Temple of Hephaestus (0.7 mi).
If you’re looking for a seafood restaurant, consider a visit to Arcadia Restaurant, The Old Tavern of Psarras, or CTC, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Novus City Hotel.
During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like Acropolis (1.0 mi), Acropolis Museum (1.2 mi), and Plaka (0.8 mi), which are all within walking distance of the hotel.
Novus City Hotel puts the best of Athens at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.
name: Novus City Hotel

description: Andromeda Suites & Apartments personnel have dedicated and committed themselves to excellence. All our guests are considered to be rather not guests but members of our family. Our boutique hotel, composed of 14 suites, tailor-made and designed to provide maximum comfort and optimal service to all its guests, even to the most demanding ones. Opening to a balcony with a city view or terrace with street view, all air-conditioned suites and 1-bedroom (50m2), 2-bedroom (90m2), 3-bedroom (150m2) apartments of Andromeda offer a separate living room with sofas and flat-screen, cable TV. Each has a mini fridge or a kitchenette with dining table and cooking hobs. Some units are fitted with parquet floor, a fireplace or Jacuzzi.
name: Andromeda Suites & Apartments

description: Situated in the historic neighbourhood of Psyrri, just a stone’s throw away from Ermou Street-Shopping Area, Ancient Agora of Athens and Monastiraki Flea Market, The Foundry is an Urban Boutique Luxury Hotel that fuses industrial design with exceptional, mid-century modern stylistics. Featuring 12 sensational, fully equipped apartments and a stunning rooftop Picnic Garden, The Foundry can boast a central location and magnificent Acropolis views. All units are fitted with spacious living spaces, Coco-Mat sleeping systems, private bathrooms, a worktable, a dining area and a fully equipped kitchenette. Each apartment includes a toaster, a fridge, a Nespresso coffee machine, a stovetop and a kettle, while some accommodation has an oven and a dishwasher. A continental breakfast is available each morning. Free toiletries and slippers are offered to our guests. Air-condition and free WiFi is standard. Acropolis is just 1.3 km. away, while Monastiraki Square is only 500 m. away.
name: The Foundry Hotel

description: Athos Hotel is located in the gorgeous historic neighbourhood of Plaka and is open throughout the year. Recently refurbished and converted into a beautiful boutique hotel, Athos Hotel offers a unique opportunity to relax and enjoy your stay in Athens in a very friendly and tranquil environment, while being in the very heart of Athens. The elegant interior of Athos Hotel, the provision of faultless professional services and the friendly attitude of the hotel staff would satisfy even the most demanding guest. Because of its location in Plaka, in the very heart of old Athens, and its excellent connection with all means of transportation, Athos Hotel is the ideal place to stay in order to visit the main Athenian attractions and get familiar with Athens. ATHOS Hotel has been renovated in November 2016.
name: Athos Hotel

description: The Pella Inn is situated in the heart of Athens within walking distance from all the historical sights of the city, the famous flea market of Monastiraki square, and the wonderful old town of Athens. You can enjoy an amazing view of the Acropolis directly from your room, and our friendly and helpful staff will make sure you have everything you need during your stay in Athens. The nearest metro station, Monastiraki, is only 200 meters away providing easy access to and from the airport, as well as a direct line to the port of Piraeus. The rooftop bar is perfect for chilling out and meeting other travellers while enjoying an amazing view of the Acropolis and the rest of the city.
name: Pella-Inn Hotel

description:
Finding an ideal budget friendly hotel in Athens does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Hotel Phaedra, a nice option for travelers like you.
The rooms offer air conditioning and a desk, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.
Hotel Phaedra features a 24 hour front desk, a rooftop terrace, and baggage storage.
While staying at Hotel Phaedra, visitors can check out Herod Atticus Odeon (0.2 mi) and Monastiraki (0.4 mi), some of Athens' top attractions.
If you’re looking for a barbeque restaurant, consider a visit to To Paradosiako, Myrtia, or Prigkipas, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Hotel Phaedra.
During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like Acropolis (0.2 mi), Acropolis Museum (0.2 mi), and Plaka (0.3 mi), which are all within walking distance of the hotel.
Hotel Phaedra puts the best of Athens at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.
name: Hotel Phaedra

description:
Finding an ideal romantic boutique hotel in Athens does not have to be difficult. 
Welcome to Athens Lodge Boutique Hotel, a nice option for travelers like you.
We are located in the heart of the city of Athens, in the traditional area of Psirri where you could reach us out of the Monastiraki Metro Station(0.1 mi) and you will be able to enjoy within a walking distance of all the important Athens attractions.
You could choose between different room choices between our Premium Room, our Superior Room with Partial View Of Acropolis, if you traveling with your family, our Executive Family room is ideal and if you are looking for a Romantic room with a Breathtaking Acropolis View & Veranda then our Deluxe room is the best option.
 All of our rooms offer air conditioning, a minibar, and a sofa, and Athens Lodge Boutique Hotel makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.

We are looking forward to welcoming you!

description: In the heart of Athens, between the Acropolis and Monastiraki, a breath away from Constitution or Syntagma Square and Plaka, in a quiet alley of 100 meters, raises with its distinct color a small hotel. Sweet Home Hotel, combines beauty and endless luxury, care and relaxation with top quality services. An old building with many neoclassical elements, which was lovingly renovated by its current owners, given particular emphasis on decoration and turned into a boutique hotel. Sweet home ... a place that travels you.. Geraniums and cyclamens in balconies, marbles and tiles, a 100-year-old wooden staircase with handcrafted details, neoclassical plasterwork- all heritage of old Athens- are kept there to connect us with the old city and its past, along with a collection of old mirrors, gramophones, cameras and other antiques.
name: Sweet Home Hotel

description:
Looking for a place to stay in Athens? Then look no further than Adonis Hotel, a quiet hotel that brings the best of Athens to your doorstep.
Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Hotel Adonis Athens offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a seating area.
During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a concierge and a rooftop terrace. Guests of Hotel Adonis are also welcome to enjoy free breakfast, located on site.
While staying at Adonis Hotel, visitors can check out Monastiraki (0.4 mi) and Temple of Hephaestus (0.5 mi), some of Athens' top attractions.
Athens has plenty of Mediterranean restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like Nolan, Funky Gourmet, and Feedel Urban Gastronomy, which are serving up some great dishes.
If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Acropolis (0.3 mi), Acropolis Museum (0.4 mi), or Plaka (0.3 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Adonis Hotel as you experience everything Athens has to offer.
name: Adonis Hotel

description: Be My Guest Athens, is a new contemporary hotel which offers rooms and suites. Located in the heart of Athen's historic center, welcoming lovers of affordable luxury. Spacious rooms, cozy lobby area and huge roof garden Just a 5-minutes walk from the famous touristic street Apostolou Pavlou, Be my Guest Athens is an ideal lodging for either a short stay or a long weekend, both for leisure and business travelers alike. Featuring spacious rooms and suites Thissio, this quiet and safe local neighborhood offers easy access to the metro and to all famous spots of Athens such as the Acropolis Hill, the Acropolis Museum, Monastiraki, Psiri, Gazi.
name: Be My Guest Athens

description:
Kimon Athens Hotel is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Athens, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.
While staying at Kimon Athens Hotel, visitors can check out Monastiraki (0.3 mi) and Temple of Hephaestus (0.3 mi), some of Athens' top attractions.
The rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.
Kimon Athens Hotel features a 24 hour front desk, a rooftop terrace, and baggage storage.
While in Athens be sure to experience local oyster favorites at Cinque Wine & Deli Bar, BlueFish Athens, or Estiatorio Milos.
During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like Acropolis (0.3 mi), Acropolis Museum (0.4 mi), and Plaka (0.1 mi), which are all within walking distance of the hotel.
Enjoy your stay in Athens!
name: Kimon Hotel Athens

description: Right in the heart of beautiful Athens city (Greece), in the scenic area of Plaka, on the foothills of the magnificent monument of Acropolis, you can find the comfortable "Nefeli" Hotel. Established in 1976, this small (18 room in total) family run hotel, has managed to gain many loyal customers over the years, both from Greece and abroad.Also, Nefeli Hotel has recently been refurbished in the neoclassical style to fit in harmony with its' surroundings. Nefeli Hotel is situated only five minutes on foot from Athens' city center and yet in a very peaceful area. It is located between the Metro Stations of Syntagma and Acropolis, close to tram and central bus lines. Staying at Nefeli Hotel is very convenient, as you are able to reach the many sights of Athens very easily.
name: Hotel Nefeli

description: SOUL Athens is situated in the heart of Athens, minutes away from the metro station Monastiraki and Omonoia and all major sights. Featuring 49 rooms and suites, provides guests with a rooftop with amazing city and Acropolis view. A Boasting bar open in the summer, a shared lounge and views of city. Airport transfers and a car rental service are also available. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a clothes rack, a kettle, Nespresso machine, a mini fridge, safety deposit box, Smart TV and bathroom with a walk in shower. At SOUL Athens Hotel the rooms are fitted with premium bed linen and towels. Some of the rooms have balconies while the penthouse suites have terraces and unostructed Acropolis view. An à la carte breakfast is available each morning with additional charge at a nearby brunch cafe in Psyrri square.
name: Play Theatrou Athens

description:
If you’re looking for a budget friendly hotel in Athens, look no further than Omiros Hotel.
For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Athens, Omiros Hotel is located a short distance from Monastiraki (0.3 mi) and Temple of Hephaestus (0.4 mi).
As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.
Guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and baggage storage while staying at Omiros Hotel. In addition, Omiros Hotel offers free breakfast, which will help make your Athens trip additionally gratifying.
When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out Arcadia Restaurant, The Old Tavern of Psarras, and CTC, which are some seafood restaurants that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.
There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular parks such as Philopappos Hill.
The staff at Omiros Hotel looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

description:
Lotus Center Apartments is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Athens, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.
Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Monastiraki (0.1 mi) and Temple of Hephaestus (0.1 mi), guests of Lotus Center Apartments can easily experience some of Athens' most well known attractions.
Guest rooms offer amenities such as air conditioning, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the small hotel.
Lotus Center Apartments features a rooftop terrace, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts free breakfast.
While visiting Athens, you may want to try some oyster at one of the nearby restaurants, such as Cinque Wine & Deli Bar, BlueFish Athens, or Estiatorio Milos.
There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular art galleries such as Taf The Art Foundation, Pandora Art Gallery, and Ioannidou Art Gallery.
Enjoy your stay in Athens!

description:
Finding an ideal romantic inn in Athens does not have to be difficult. Welcome to 360Degrees Pop Art Hotel, a nice option for travelers like you.
While staying at 360Degrees Pop Art Hotel, visitors can check out Monastiraki (0.1 mi) and Open Air Cinema THISION (0.4 mi), some of Athens' top attractions.
Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at 360Degrees Pop Art Hotel offer air conditioning, a refrigerator, and a minibar.
During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a 24 hour front desk and baggage storage. Guests of 360Degrees Pop Art Hotel are also welcome to enjoy a hot tub and a lounge, located on site.
Athens has plenty of sushi restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like Nikkei, Sushimou, and Osaka Sushi Bar, which are serving up some great dishes.
Plus, during your trip, don’t forget to check out some of the popular ancient ruins, such as Acropolis, Parthenon, and Temple of Hephaestus.
360Degrees Pop Art Hotel looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Athens.

description: Located in the heart of the lively Psirri neighborhood of central Athens, PÁME House offers modernly decorated rooms with balconies and free WiFi access. Just a breath away from the vibrant Monastiraki square and Ermou street Shopping areas, PÁME House air-conditioned rooms feature Netflix ready Smart TV, private modern bathroom with shower, toiletries and hairdryer, Nespresso machine with capsules, mini fridge, kettle and safe. Some rooms offer big. spacious balconies with a rain shower bathtub and a lounge area. Guests can opt-in for fresh Greek breakfast, prepared and served daily, steps away from the property! Experiences, Car hire, Airport pickup and/or drop-off, but most importantly a Fun Manager concierge services that are available and activated on demand! Popular points of interest in a 500 meter radius include Anafiotika, Ancient and Roman Agora, Thission, Keramikos and the daily busy flea markets, as well as nightlife districts of Psirri, Monastiraki, Plaka and Agias Irinis square. The Acropolis and Syntagma square are 15 minutes walk. The main port of Piraeus and Athens International Airport are easily accessible by metro, 20 km away. PÁME | ΠΑΜΕ | LET'S GO | VAMOS | ANDIAMO | ALLONS-Y

description: See why so many travelers make Athens Way their choice when visiting Athens. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you. Athens Way is a family-friendly offering a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.Athens way features a 24 hour front desk, a rooftop terrace, and room service. Plus, guests can enjoy breakfast, which has made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Athens. For guests with a vehicle, there is paid private parking available nearby. While staying at Athens Way, visitors can check out Monastiraki (0.8 mi) and Panathenaic Stadium (0.8 mi), some of Athens' top attractions. Travelers looking to enjoy some oyster can head to Cinque Wine & Deli Bar, BlueFish Athens, or Estiatorio Milos. Otherwise, you may want to check out a Mediterranean restaurant such as Nolan, Funky Gourmet, or Feedel Urban Gastronomy. If you’re looking for something to do, Acropolis (1.0 mi), Acropolis Museum (1.2 mi), and Plaka (0.8 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of Athens Way. We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Athens Way as you experience all of the things Athens has to offer.
name: Athens Way

description: NSPLACE is a luxurious spacious apartment, that combines modern and comfortable designing and furnishing as well as the most captivating view of the Acropolis and the neighbourhoods that surround it, located in the heart of Athens' historical centre Monastiraki. Lots of picturesque tavernas offering special traditional treats, cafes, bars, as well as shops selling souvenirs and traditional Greek products fulfil the scenery of the indescribable view available from all the rooms of the apartment. By staying in this characteristic area of "old" Athens, you are provided with the ease and pleasure of taking long strolls in the narrow streets filled with the small buildings where the city's traditional bazaar is held. In just a few minutes walk you will be enjoying visiting the "core" of the city, Plaka neighbourhood, with houses and mansions from the time of the Turkish occupation and the Neoclassical period and ancient monuments, such as the Lysikrates Monument, the Roman Agora with the famed "Tower of the Winds" as well as true masterpieces of Byzantine art and architecture (Fetihie Mosque, Tzistaraki Mosque, the Turkish Bath near the Tower of the Winds, the Muslim Seminary). At a close distance you can visit on foot, imposing museums, approachable also via tube, such as the Folk Art museum, the Greek Children's Art museum and Frysira Art Gallery. Moreover, just across the wonderfully crowded Monastiraki square, is the Psyrri area, which during the past few years has evolved into one of the most important "centres" of the town's with scores of bars, tavernas, ouzeris, clubs, where you can taste the marvellous greek cuisine and take a glimpse of the athenian nights' fantasy.
name: NS Place

description: Welcome to GAIA, your Greek home from home, located in one of Athen’s most exciting and influential neighbourhoods! Our family-run hotel based in the heart of Athens offers a stay like no other, especially for travellers looking to experience real Greece, and live the local way! With our newly renovated rooms, guests are invited to immerse themselves in Athens’ culture with all necessary amenities and home comforts at their disposal. Enjoy a relaxing stay in one of our spacious rooms, recently renovated and designed to capture the spirit of our wonderful neighbourhood Psirri, a character of its own, where old meets new and real Greece shines through! Our rooms provide the ultimate space for those looking to explore the city in style. All rooms are provided with a king bed, a practical smartphone (with free international minutes and data!), WiFi, air-conditioning, complimentary breakfast tray and much more, to ensure complete comfort on your city-break away!
name: Gaia Athens

description: In the heart of Athens, the much beloved and most gorgeous neighbourhood of Athens, Monastiraki area, in the lively Athens Commercial Triangle, a hospitality star is born, the Athens Starlight Hotel. There is not much to say about the location of the Athens Starlight Hotel, it is right in the middle of an area that is brimming with shops, hipster restaurants, traditional taverns, and trendy bars, within walking distance to most major sights of the city. The repurposed old commercial building, that houses Athens Starlight Hotel, is located in Agathonos street, and was carefully renovated and elegantly refurbished to become a hospitality star. Offering a wide selection of room types, services, and amenities that will meet the needs of our guests and ensure a pleasant stay in Athens, the brand-new Athens Starlight Hotel opened its doors in July 2019. You can select your room or suite among 8 types of stylish decorated spaces that can accommodate comfortably up to 4 guests, enjoy your breakfast in the gorgeous Athens Starlight Hotel Breakfast Room, and hold a professional meeting in the Athens Starlight Hotel Meeting Room. The hotel front desk staff is at your disposal to help you make the most of your stay in Athens, book tours, excursions and tickets, recommend restaurants and bars, or call a taxi. We will be delighted to see you soon at the Athens Starlight Hotel!
name: Athens Starlight Hotel

description: We are a budget friendly family-run Hotel centrally located in the Acropolis area of Athens. We began our operation back in the early 80’s when a family member and architect converted our family residence into today’s Athenian home enjoyed since by thousands of our guests. Our Ηotel is well-situated in a safe neighborhood of Koukaki, one of the coolest districts of Athens. We are conveniently located near the Acropolis, the Acropolis Museum, and the many interconnected archaeological sites of significance, most of which can be easily reached on foot or via our nearby metro and tram stations or by bus (all a few minutes away). ​ Furthermore, the bustling pedestrian alley just down our street offers convenient access to a variety of enticing restaurants, tavernas, bars/pubs and cafes.
name: Art Gallery Hotel

description: Set on the historic Kaplanon Street, Sir Athens Boutique Hotel provides its guests with luxury, comfort and privacy. In the spirit of a real, royal ordained sir, the neoclassical building of 300 square meters undertakes to initiate its guests in the spirit of the famous Greek hospitality, ensuring for them the suite that will best meet their desires. Thanks to the excellent location of Sir Athens, its guests will have the opportunity to enjoy the tranquility of a secluded pedestrian street, just one minute away from one of the busiest, fancy streets of the center of Athens, Skoufa Street. Five minutes walk from the “Panepistimio” Metro station and a breath away from the most famous cafes, the famous bars and the bigger theaters of Athens, the guests of Sir Athens will enjoy the ease of traveling while going straight into the rhythms of one city that beyond its history, is also famous for its amusement. Sir Athens, built back in 1800, is right next to the historic and significant value of Athens' cultural heritage home of Pavlos Kountouriotis, the rear admiral, politician and a great man of the Greek history. Sir Athens is the ideal place for those who wish to experience both modern and the old upper-class of Athens. Athens, culture, taste and good life. Sir Athens: Let's share the most sophisticated side of Athens.
name: Sir Athens Boutique Hotel

description: Monsieur Didot welcomes his friends to an astounding Athenian neoclassical house, built in the early 20th century and sitting in the beating heart of Athens, the Kolonaki quarter. A home away from home is what Monsieur Didot wishes his friends to feel upon the very first moment of their arrival! His guests enjoy a truly homely atmosphere, with modern facilities and amenities they can enjoy in their own homes! Just five minutes from the ‘Panepistimio’ metro station, the home is surrounded by theatres, museums, publishing houses and historic bookstores, as well as countless cafés, bars, restaurants and boutiques belonging to some of Europe’s largest fashion houses, Monsieur Didot’s house is the perfect setting from which to experience this extraordinary ancient city in all of its historic, cultural and creative glory. Monsieur Didot invites us to love Athens as much as he did!
name: Monsieur Didot

description:
If you’re looking for a romantic small hotel in Athens, look no further than 18 Micon Str..
For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Athens, 18 Micon Str. is located a short distance from Monastiraki (0.2 mi) and Open Air Cinema THISION (0.4 mi).
Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at 18 Micon Str. offer air conditioning, a minibar, and a refrigerator.
During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a concierge, 24 hour check-in, and baggage storage. Guests of 18 Micon Str. are also welcome to enjoy breakfast, located on site. For travelers arriving by car, parking is available.
During your visit, be sure to check out one of Athens' popular oyster restaurants such as Cinque Wine & Deli Bar, BlueFish Athens, and Estiatorio Milos, all a short distance from 18 Micon Str..
Looking to explore? Then look no further than Acropolis (0.5 mi), Acropolis Museum (0.7 mi), and Plaka (0.3 mi), which are some popular Athens attractions – all conveniently located within walking distance of the small hotel.
The staff at 18 Micon Str. looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.
name: 18 Micon Street

description: In a 19th century Neoclassical building we have created six cozy apartments, walking distance from the Acropolis and the historical city center. Based here you can discover all sight seeings of Athens with the help of our friendly staff. In Athens Residence we provide fully furnished one bedroom apartments in the heart of the historical center. Our neighborhood is very quiet and safe , ideal for families, couples and business travelers . Our apartments are A1 and A2 semi-basement around the courtyard , B1 and B2 on a raised ground floor and C1 and C2 on the first floor .
name: Athens Residence Apartments

description:
If you’re looking for a family-friendly guest house in Athens, look no further than V1935 Luxurious Apartments.
Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Monastiraki (0.4 mi) and Temple of Hephaestus (0.5 mi), guests of V1935 Luxurious Apartments can easily experience some of Athens' most well known attractions.
Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at V1935 Luxurious Apartments offer air conditioning and a kitchenette.
Guests of V1935 Luxurious Apartments are also welcome to enjoy a rooftop pool, located on site.
During your visit, be sure to check out one of Athens' popular shrimp restaurants such as Nolan, Dionysos Zonar's, and Strofi, all a short distance from V1935 Luxurious Apartments.
Athens is also known for some great art galleries, including Taf The Art Foundation, Pandora Art Gallery, and Ioannidou Art Gallery, which are not too far from V1935 Luxurious Apartments.
The staff at V1935 Luxurious Apartments looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.
name: V1935 Luxurious Apartments

description: Noble Suites is a neoclassical property from 1901 which is placed next to Acropolis. In few minutes of walking, a visitor embraces the marvelous Parthenon and Acropolis Museum. The nearby ancient districts of Plaka and Anafiotika are making Noble Suites attractive for its visitors. Following the Greek tradition of professionalism in accommodating, Noble Suites prioritize its every guest needs with sincere passion and continuously strive to keep the art of serving people on exceeding level. Renovated in 2018, areas of the building are converted to luxury, spacious suites that feature warm, wooden floors and bathrooms covered with refined Greek Dionysus marble. Elegant design concept enhance homely atmosphere which makes a guest feel warm-hearted welcomed. Unique pieces of fine furniture which enrich the rooms present a hand work by world famed designer A. Theodore.
name: Noble Suites

description: In the heart of the hippest neighborhood of Athens, just under the Acropolis lies the amazing The Koukaki Residence. Built in the early 1930s by award winning architect Emmanuel Lazaridis, who also built the trademark monument of ‘The Unknown Soldier’ right in front of the Greek parliament, The Koukaki Residence is housed in a historical building of unique design and aesthetics. The Koukaki Residence consists of 7 spacious residences, rooms & suites, reflecting the art nouveau ambience of the period. The residences surround a blooming secret garden in the middle of the building, filled with lemon and orange trees, where one can enjoy a morning coffee or an evening glass of wine in a peaceful and quiet environment right under the acropolis. This is why The Koukaki Residence will definitely conquer your heart!
name: The Koukaki Residence

description:
Welcome to Hotel Tony, your Athens “home away from home.” Hotel Tony aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.
Close to some of Athens' most popular landmarks, such as Philopappos Hill (0.2 mi) and Herod Atticus Odeon (0.3 mi), Hotel Tony is a great destination for tourists.
Hotel Tony is a charming hotel offering a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.
The hotel features a sun terrace. For guests with a vehicle, street parking is available.
While in Athens, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Hotel Tony, including Nolan (0.8 mi), Feedel Urban Gastronomy (0.8 mi), and Dionysos Zonar's (0.3 mi).
During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like Acropolis (0.5 mi), Acropolis Museum (0.4 mi), and Plaka (0.8 mi), which are all within walking distance of the hotel.
Hotel Tony puts the best of Athens at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.
name: Hotel Tony

description:
Looking for a place to stay in Athens? Then look no further than Pythagorion Hotel, a quiet hotel that brings the best of Athens to your doorstep.
As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.
Guests have access to a 24 hour front desk and baggage storage while staying at Athens Best Western. In addition, Best Western Athens offers a lounge, which will help make your Athens trip additionally gratifying.
Nearby landmarks such as Monastiraki (0.6 mi) and Temple of Hephaestus (0.6 mi) make Best Western Athens a great place to stay when visiting Athens.
While in Athens be sure to experience local shrimp favorites at Nolan, Dionysos Zonar's, or Strofi.
If you are interested in exploring Athens, check out one of the historic sites, such as Acropolis, Parthenon, and Herod Atticus Odeon.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Pythagorion Hotel as you experience everything Athens has to offer.
name: Pythagorion Hotel

description: The hotel with the best access to the centre of Athens, the Acropolis, historical monuments and museums, as well as the airport, the port, and railway and metro stations.The Athens lotus hotel, a neoclassical building dating from the early 20th century, fully renovated in 2009 as a 4-star hotel, is the starting point of a new activity that prioritizes aesthetic rejuvenation and hospitality.In the historical centre of Athens, 50 metres from the Metaxourghio metro station, within walking distance of the National Archaeological Museum, the main railway station and the suburban railway, the hotel is an ideal home-base for direct access to all of the cities important destinations, as well as to the airport and the port. Additionally, the hotel has free private parking facilities for its customers.
name: Athens Lotus Hotel

While staying at Best Western Museum Hotel, visitors can check out Monastiraki (0.9 mi) and Temple of Hephaestus (1.0 mi), some of Athens' top attractions.

Enjoy your stay in Athens!

description:
Enjoying a very central location, Athens Studios is 350 feet from the Acropolis Metro Station, 500 feet from the New Acropolis Museum and 1,650 feet from the entrance of the Acropolis. The property has access to rooftop area with Acropolis views and Bar, and a on-site Restaurant, Plus an onsite Bar with craft beers and sports. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. All rooms are fitted with covid proof smart locks so you can use you smart phone as your key. Also, enjoy completely contactless check ins.

All air-conditioned rooms, studios and apartments at Athens Studios are spacious and modernly furnished featuring tiled floors. They have an en-suite bathrooms and a well-equipped kitchenette, while most also include balconies.

Guests can start their day with a free breakfast (08:00-10:00) prepared with local ingredients, while lunch and dinner can also be enjoyed at the on-site restaurant open daily from 12:00 until midnight. Drinks and snacks are available at the bars.

Staff at the 24-hour front desk can provide information on the attractions of the area. Other facilities include a 24-hour self-service laundry, a spacious street-level area with several seating arrangements, and locker storage.

The central Syntagma Square is less than a 10-minute walk away from the property. The shopping district of Ermou is at only 0.6 miles. Free public parking is available on the nearby streets.

Guests rate Athens Studios at 9.8 out of 10 for location due to its proximity to the Acropolis and New Museum in the Nicest part of the city.
name: Athens Studios
